name: data.webuild.sg
description: store snapshot data for webuild.sg for events and repos

scripts.build: jade views/index.jade -o . -P && node graphs/reposPerProgramming && node graphs/eventsPerGroup && node graphs/reposPerWeek && node graphs/eventsPerWeek && node graphs/eventsPerDayOfWeek && node graphs/eventsPerTimeOfDay && node graphs/eventsPerDuration
scripts.test: jshint graphs tasks test public/js && NODE_ENV=test mocha && jsinspect ./tasks ./graphs -t 30
